channel.title: Mathematical Michael on Mathematical Michael
channel.description: Recent content in Mathematical Michael on Mathematical Michael

item.title: GitHub Activity
item.description:
Here is a summary of my activity on Github from my new username. The primary repository is my thesis. I will gradually add public-facing projects here as well.

Loading the data just for you.

The second summary is my legacy username:

Loading the data just for you.

item.title: Probably Art # 365: Walk
item.description:
250 steps in 6 direction(s) chosen from 1 possible step size(s).

$$ s = .01422527, \; $$ $$ | \lbrace \theta \rbrace | = 6, $$ $$ | \lbrace r \rbrace | = 1,$$ $$ r_0 = 0.0000,$$ $$ R = 0.58, $$ $$r \sim \beta(1.000, 1.000), $$ $$\theta \sim \beta(1.000, 1.000). $$

item.title: Probably Art # 364: Polygon
item.description:
1834-sided polygon with vertices chosen from 9 distance(s) from the origin.

$$ s = .00292954, \; $$ $$ | \lbrace \theta \rbrace | = 1834, $$ $$ | \lbrace r \rbrace | = 9,$$ $$ r_0 = 0.2500,$$ $$ R = 1.00, $$ $$r \sim \beta(25.000, 44.000), $$ $$\theta \sim \beta(1.000, 1.000). $$

item.title: Probably Art # 363: Line
item.description:
2052 lines drawn through each origin in one of 2 direction(s) with lengths chosen from 8 size(s).

$$ s = .00035708, \; $$ $$ | \lbrace \theta \rbrace | = 2, $$ $$ | \lbrace r \rbrace | = 8,$$ $$ r_0 = 0.0000,$$ $$ R = 3.00, $$ $$r \sim \beta(0.857, 0.597), $$ $$\theta \sim \beta(1.442, 0.790). $$
